HTMLEmbedElementType.summary: The type property of the interface returns a string that reflects the type attribute of the {{HTMLElement("embed")}} element, indicating the MIME type of the resource. It reflects the {{htmlelement("embed")}} element's type attribute

remarks.para:
-
-
-Media types found on the web
-Important MIME types for web developers

HTMLEmbedElementType.value: A string; the MIME type of the resource.
